name: WrightMediaNewstalkKCLI
0:
”Alexa, ask wright media newstalk what's playing.”
”Alexa, ask wright media newstalk to play live.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wright media newstalk
Developer Terms of Use
des: Listen to Newstalk for Western Oklahoma live and to our special recorded audio events with this great app! Keep up with Thomas Terrier sports and other local events. When you're not able to receive the signal from 99.3FM you can keep up with us here!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
